data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 1,657,450 who are far from you in Dehradun, Uttarakhand, India from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Dehradun, Uttarakhand, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, we ask for 339 new simple churches in the county of Dehradun, Uttarakhand, India. Place a simple church in every community of the 1,696,700 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

data.prayer: Father, let those from the 18,664 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the county of Dehradun, Uttarakhand, India that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 1,696,700 people living in Dehradun.
Father, encourage your church in Dehradun that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.prayer: Lord, teach the young people in the county of Dehradun to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.
